sqlMap.select:
SELECT BATCH_ID ,CREATE_TIME ,CREATE_NUM ,MER_SYS_ID ,FACTORY_ID ,STATUS ,FILE_NAME ,RESERVED1 ,RESERVED2 ,RESERVED3 FROM TERMINAL_BATCH_CONFIG WHERE 1=1 AND TERMINAL_BATCH_CONFIG.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(BATCH_ID) =#batch_id#
(CREATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#create_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_NUM) Like '%'||(#create_num:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_SYS_ID) =#mer_sys_id#
(FACTORY_ID) Like '%'||(#factory_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(STATUS) Like '%'||(#status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(FILE_NAME) Like '%'||(#file_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED1) Like '%'||(#reserved1:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED2) Like '%'||(#reserved2:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED3) Like '%'||(#reserved3:VARCHAR#)||'%'
$orderStr$

SELECT count(1) FROM TERMINAL_BATCH_CONFIG WHERE 1=1 AND TERMINAL_BATCH_CONFIG.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(BATCH_ID) =#batch_id#
(CREATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#create_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_NUM) Like '%'||(#create_num:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_SYS_ID) =#mer_sys_id#
(FACTORY_ID) Like '%'||(#factory_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(STATUS) Like '%'||(#status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(FILE_NAME) Like '%'||(#file_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED1) Like '%'||(#reserved1:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED2) Like '%'||(#reserved2:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED3) Like '%'||(#reserved3:VARCHAR#)||'%'
